name: psycho-boost
effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
short_effect: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.x_y: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
